import React from 'react' import ShippingImg from '../assets/images/ic_shipping.png' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Link, Route } from "react-router-dom"; const IndividualProducts = ({id,price,thumbnail,title,address, shipping}) =>{ return(

${price}

{ (shipping == true) && }

{title}

{address}

) } export default IndividualProducts
